category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_file_process_dir
preference.preference_description: Defines the destination directory path to be used to move files for processing on the Teamcenter server. It is used by the "imds_download_process_files" utility. There is no default value.
